00020 #ifndef GCONTAINER_H
00021 #define GCONTAINER_H
00022 
00023 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00024 #  include <config.h>
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #include <glib.h>
00028 
00030 typedef enum { GCONT_PTR_ARRAY, GCONT_LIST, GCONT_SLIST } GContType;
00031 
00033 typedef struct {
00034         GContType type;
00035         int len;
00036         void *data;
00037 } GContainer;
00038 
00040 typedef struct {
00041         GContType type;
00042         int index;
00043         union {
00044                 GPtrArray *array;
00045                 GSList *slistPtr;
00046                 struct {
00047                         GList *curr;
00048                         GList *last;
00049                 } list;
00050         } data;
00051 } GIterator;
00052 
00053 GContainer* g_container_new(GContType type);
00054 GContainer* g_container_new_from_data(GContType type, void *data);
00055 
00057 GContainer* g_container_dup(const GContainer *container);
00058 
00059 void g_container_add(GContainer *container, const gpointer data);
00060 void g_container_concat(GContainer *container, const GContainer *new_items);
00061 
00062 gboolean g_container_remove(GContainer *container, const gpointer data);
00063 gboolean g_container_remove_fast(GContainer *container, const gpointer data);
00064 gpointer g_container_remove_index(GContainer *container, guint index);
00065 gpointer g_container_remove_index_fast(GContainer *container, guint index);
00066 
00067 gpointer g_container_index(const GContainer *container, guint index);
00068 
00069 gboolean g_container_get_iter(GIterator *iter, const GContainer *container);
00070 gboolean g_container_get_iter_last(GIterator *iter, const GContainer *container);
00071 
00072 gpointer g_iterator_get(const GIterator *iter);
00073 gpointer g_iterator_next(GIterator *iter);
00074 gpointer g_iterator_prev(GIterator *iter);
00075 gboolean g_iterator_hasNext(const GIterator *iter);
00076 gboolean g_iterator_hasPrev(const GIterator *iter);
00077 
00079 void* g_container_free(GContainer *container, gboolean freeAssoc);
00080 
00082 void g_container_copy(GContainer *dest, const GContainer *src);
00084 void* g_container_convert(GContType type, GContainer *container);
00086 void g_container_destroy(GContainer *array);
